name: AMERICAN VAPOR MANUFACTURERS
description: National Trade Association that represents small independent vaping manufacturers.
sampleDescriptions: American Vaping Manufacturers Trade Association advocates for both reducing youth vaping use while still providing a pathway for responsible adults to use vaping products to quit smoking more harmful
American Vaping Manufacturers Trade Association advocates for both reducing youth vaping use while still providing a pathway for responsible adults to use vaping products to quit smoking more harmful
